Lounge and Bar

​This setup is for service companies who provides all kind of service that customer can avail at the Airport like Porter Service, Buggy Service, Airport Assistance etc..

​This Services can be avail directly from the airport and individuals can also purchase the services from the website.


Business Flows


Flow 1: Sell Service Online

  1. Visit the website & select the service you want buy.
  2. Place the order by filling the required details during checkout process.
  3. Once the order placed, customer receive the call from the service department for the confirmation.
  4. Customer will get the order detail via email.

Sometime we also got call or email and based on that we book the service manually by creating the Sales order.


Flow 2: Sell Service using POS

We have a multiple employees who are at the airport to provide all type of airport service on the go. Each one has their own POS shop with log in credentials.

  1. Customer will visit the airport and wants to buy a Porter Service.
  2. Porter user will open the POS and select desire the service.
  3. Select the payment method and place the order.

this process will be same for other services like Buggy Service, Airport Assistance etc...


Flow 3: Lounge with Bar

We also server beer in the bar. We serve the beer in 125 ml of Glass only and also purchase in the bottle of 500 ml or 1 Ltr.

Setup

a. Create two product one which you purchase(ex. Beer 500 ml) and another which you will sell(ex. Beer 125 ml).

b. Create new UOM as "Bottle of 500 ml" under UNIT category and define the ration 0.5 and the type will be smaller and save it.

c. Now create a KIT type bill of material for the product of Beer 125 ml. Components will be Beer 500 ml product with consume qty 0.25.

Once above setup is done, we are ready to start our sell from the POS Session.

Process Flaw

- Employee will log in with the credential in the Airport Assistance POS.

- Now customer ask for 2 glass of Beer, Will select the Beer 125 ml product and set the qty as 2.

- Complete the order by received the payment.

Now if we check the inventory then Beer 500 ml product is consumed by 0.5 ml from the current stock because of the KIT type Bill of material.
